about.details:
Incorporated in February 2011, Neopolitan Pizza And Foods Limited has two segments: restaurant operations and agricultural commodity trading. 

The company owns and operates restaurants and also operates through a franchise model. It specializes in Neapolitan-style pizza made with fresh ingredients and offers a variety of toppings, including gluten-free and vegetarian options.

Neapolitan Pizza is ISO 22000:2018 certified and offers a variety of soups, salads, bread, pasta, hand-tossed pizza, and desserts. The concept is family-oriented and kid-friendly.

Neapolitan Pizza and Foods Limited also trade agricultural commodities such as wheat, rice, tomatoes, and onions. The aim is to source high-quality products from trusted suppliers and offer them to customers at competitive prices.

The company expanded its global presence by investing $87,500 in its wholly-owned subsidiary, Neoindian Pizza Inc., located in the USA.

As of March 31, 2024, the company operated 21 restaurants in over 16 cities, spanning 2 states and union territories in India.

Competetitve Strength

  • Neapolitan Pizza And Foods Limited is known for its authentic Neapolitan-style pizza made using traditional techniques and ingredients.
  • Diverse menu to cater to different tastes and dietary preferences.
  • Strong brand identity through consistent branding across all its outlets and marketing channels.
  • The company uses technology in many parts of its operations, like online ordering, tracking deliveries, and getting feedback from customers.
  • Neopolitan Pizza And Foods Limited emphasizes customer service through well-trained staff, prompt service, and personalized attention, creating a positive customer experience and fostering loyalty.

faqs.question: What is the NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO?
faqs.answer:
NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO is a SME IPO of 6000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹12.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹20 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on September 30, 2024, and closes on October 4, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO opens on September 30, 2024 and closes on October 4, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO?
faqs.answer: NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO lot size is 6000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO will be done on Monday, October 7, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, October 8, 2024. Check the NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The NeoPolitan Pizza and Foods IPO listing date is on Wednesday, October 9, 2024.
